channel.title: Probably easy error
channel.description: im trying to convert this stockmarket into pi and i did but the problem is say you do ::buyearth 5000 [Eachstock costing 50000], if you dont have enough money it wont let you buy it but if you have more then the money it takes away all of the money in your inventory. if you have 2 bil in your inventory and you do ::buyearth 1 it should only cost 50000 but it takes away the 2b. The same with the selling side ::sellearth 1 takes away all your stocks and gives you the amount you typed.

item.title: Probably easy error
item.dc:creator: @RedFalconBlue RedFalconBlue
item.description:
@RedFalconBlue wrote:

sure these are the same for all 4 cammands just item idâ€™s and command names are different.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("buyearth") && (playerCommand.length() > 9)){ int amount = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(9)); int stockcost = 50000; //price per stock if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, amount*stockcost) && amount <= 10000) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, amount*stockcost); c.getItems().addItem(576, amount); c.sendMessage("You invest "+amount*stockcost+" in "+amount+" Earth stocks."); c.sendMessage("Say ::sellearth (amount) to sell - they do not have to be in noted form"); }else{ c.sendMessage("You need "+amount*stockcost+"gp to purchase "+amount+" Earth Stocks."); c.sendMessage("You can only buy 10000 stocks at a time"); } } if(playerCommand.startsWith("sellearth") && (playerCommand.length() > 10)){ int amount = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(10)); int stockcost = 50000; //price per stock if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(576, amount) && amount <= 10000) { c.getItems().deleteItem(576, amount); c.getItems().addItem(995, amount*stockcost); c.sendMessage("You sell "+amount+" Earth Stocks for "+amount*stockcost+" Gp"); c.sendMessage("Say ::buyearth to buy back Earth Stocks"); }else{ c.sendMessage("You "+amount+" Earth orbs to sell "+amount+" Earth Stocks."); c.sendMessage("Still not working? Make sure your stocks are in Noted form ;)"); c.sendMessage("You can only sell 10000 Stocks at a time"); } }

Read full topic

im trying to convert this stockmarket into pi and i did but the problem is say you do ::buyearth 5000 [Eachstock costing 50000], if you dont have enough money it wont let you buy it but if you have more then the money it takes away all of the money in your inventory. if you have 2 bil in your inventory and you do ::buyearth 1 it should only cost 50000 but it takes away the 2b.
The same with the selling side ::sellearth 1 takes away all your stocks and gives you the amount you typed.
